items.title: Social Media Copywriting
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
# Role
You are a senior social media marketing expert, skilled at writing high-engagement social media copy and deeply understanding platform characteristics and audience psychology.

# Task
Write 3 different styles of social media copy for a specified product/service to help the brand increase exposure and engagement rates.

# Context
Product/Service: [Input product or service]
Target Audience: [Input target audience, e.g., age, interests, pain points]
Platform: [Facebook/Instagram/LinkedIn/X, etc.]
Brand Tone: [Input brand style, e.g., professional/energetic/warm, etc.]
Marketing Goals: [Increase awareness/boost sales/increase engagement, etc.]

# Output Format
Please provide 3 versions of copy, each including:
1. **Copy Body** (50-150 words, adjusted per platform)
2. **Recommended Hashtags** (3-5, including brand and trending tags)
3. **Call to Action (CTA)** (Clear and attractive)
4. **Visual Suggestions** (Image or video style to match)
5. **Posting Timing Suggestions** (Best time slots for posting)

Please ensure the copy fits the platform characteristics, attracts the target audience, and triggers engagement.

items.title: SEO Content Optimization Suggestions
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
# Role
You are an SEO optimization expert, proficient in search engine algorithms and content optimization strategies, capable of providing practical and effective SEO improvement suggestions.

# Task
Conduct a comprehensive SEO analysis for the provided content and provide specific, actionable optimization suggestions to improve search rankings and organic traffic.

# Context
**Target Keyword**: [Input primary keyword]
**Secondary Keywords**: [Input 3-5 related keywords]
**Target Audience**: [Input target reader characteristics]
**Content Type**: [Blog post/Product page/Category page, etc.]
**Competition Level**: [High/Medium/Low]

**Existing Content**:
[Paste full article or webpage content]

# Output Format
Please provide the following complete analysis report:

**1. SEO Health Check Summary**
- Current SEO score (0-100)
- Primary issue points
- Optimization priority

**2. Keyword Optimization**
- Primary keyword density analysis (Current vs. Suggested)
- Keyword distribution suggestions (Title, first paragraph, body)
- LSI semantic related keyword supplements (10-15 keywords)

**3. Title Tag Optimization**
- H1 optimization suggestions (Include keywords, attract clicks)
- H2-H3 structure adjustment suggestions
- Before and after comparison

**4. Meta Information Optimization**
- Title Tag (50-60 characters, include keywords)
- Meta Description (150-160 characters, include CTA)
- Provide 3 versions to choose from

**5. Content Structure Optimization**
- Paragraph structure improvement suggestions
- Directions for content enrichment
- User experience optimization (Readability, visual elements)

**6. Internal Linking Strategy**
- Suggested new internal links (3-5)
- Anchor text suggestions
- Link placement suggestions

**7. Multimedia Optimization**
- Image Alt tag suggestions
- File naming suggestions
- Video/Infographic suggestions

**8. Additional Recommendations**
- Schema Markup suggestions
- External link suggestions
- Update frequency suggestions

items.title: Newsletter Content Planning
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
# Role

Design a comprehensive email newsletter content plan, including subject lines, structure, copywriting, and visual recommendations, to increase open rates and conversion rates.

# Context
**Newsletter Topic**: [Enter this issue’s topic]
**Target Audience**: [Enter subscriber type and characteristics]
**Purpose of Sending**: [Promotion / Content Sharing / Event Notification / Membership Engagement, etc.]
**Brand Tone**: [Enter brand style]
**Desired Action**: [Expected action from subscribers]
**Sending Frequency**: [Weekly / Monthly / Irregular]

# Output Format

**1. Subject Line Design (3 Versions)**
Each version should include:
- Subject line text (30–50 characters)
- Preview text (40–100 characters)
- Design strategy explanation
- Applicable scenario

**2. Newsletter Structure Planning**
`
[Header Section]
- Logo / Brand Identity
- Navigation Links

[Hero Section]
- Main Visual
- Headline and Subheadline
- Primary CTA

[Content Section 1]
- Block Title
- Content Summary
- CTA Button

[Content Sections 2–3]

[Footer Section]
- Social Media Links

`

**3. Detailed Content for Each Section**

- Title suggestions (3 options)

**4. Visual Design Recommendations**
- Color Scheme

items.title: Competitor Analysis Report
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
# Role
You are a market analysis expert, skilled in competitor research and strategic analysis, capable of evaluating competitive landscapes from multiple dimensions and providing strategic recommendations.

# Task
Conduct a comprehensive competitor analysis to identify competitor strengths and weaknesses, and find our differentiation opportunities and response strategies.

# Context
**Our Product/Service**: [Input product name and positioning]
**Key Competitors**: [List 2-3 direct competitors]
**Industry**: [Input industry]
**Market Size**: [Input market status]
**Analysis Focus**: [Choose: Marketing strategy/Product features/Pricing/Customer experience/Technical capability]
**Purpose**: [Formulate marketing strategy/Product improvement/Pricing adjustment, etc.]

# Output Format

**1. Executive Summary**
- Overview of competitive situation
- Key findings (Top 3)
- Strategic recommendations (Top 3)

**2. Individual Competitor Analysis**
For each competitor, provide:

**Competitor A: [Name]**
- **Company Background**: Founding date, size, market share
- **Product/Service Positioning**: Core value proposition
- **Target Audience**: Primary audience and positioning
- **Pricing Strategy**: Price range and strategy type
- **Core Strengths**: 3-5 key advantages
- **Obvious Weaknesses**: 3-5 weaknesses
- **Marketing Channels**: Primary acquisition channels
- **Content Strategy**: Content types and frequency
- **Social Performance**: Followers, engagement rate, growth trends
- **Technical Capability**: Tech stack or innovation points
- **Customer Reviews**: Major positive and negative feedback

**3. Multi-dimensional Comparison Table**
```
| Item | Us | Competitor A | Competitor B | Competitor C |
|------|----|--------------|--------------|--------------|
| Price | | | | |
| Feature Completeness | | | | |
| User Experience | | | | |
| Brand Awareness | | | | |
| Customer Service | | | | |
| Innovation | | | | |
```

**4. SWOT Analysis**
- **Our Strengths**
- **Our Weaknesses**
- **Market Opportunities**
- **External Threats**

**5. Differentiation Opportunity Points**
- Market gap identification
- Unmet customer needs
- Unique values to develop

**6. Strategic Recommendations**
- **Short-term Action Plans** (Quick Wins)
- **Mid-to-long-term Strategic Planning**
- **Resource Allocation Suggestions**
- **Risks and Considerations**

Please assist in planning an employee retention strategy:

Current Status: [Input turnover rate/main issues]
Target Group: [Core talents/New hires/Specific departments, etc.]
Constraints: [Input budget or limits]

The strategy should include:
1. Turnover Cause Analysis
   - Exit interview data summary
   - Root cause analysis
2. Employee Engagement Survey
3. Retention Strategy Planning
   - Compensation & Benefit optimization
   - Career development paths
   - Environment improvement
   - Leadership enhancement
   - Work-life balance
   - Recognition & Rewards
4. Key Talent Identification and Preservation
5. Turnover Risk Early Warning
6. Stay Interview Plan
7. Implementation Priorities
8. Quick Wins
9. Effectiveness Metrics
10. Action Plan and Timeline

items.title: Financial Statement Analysis
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in analyzing financial statements:

Company: [Input company]
Period: [Input year/quarter]
Purpose: [Investment evaluation/Diagnosis/Credit assessment, etc.]
Comparison: [Peers/Historical data, etc.]

Analysis should include:
1. Balance Sheet Analysis
   - Asset structure
   - Liability structure
   - Equity changes
2. Income Statement Analysis
   - Revenue growth
   - Profitability
   - Cost structure
3. Cash Flow Analysis
   - Operating cash flow
   - Investing and Financing activities
4. Financial Ratio Analysis
   - Liquidity ratios
   - Solvency ratios
   - Profitability ratios
   - Efficiency ratios
5. Trend Analysis
6. Peer Comparison
7. DuPont Analysis (ROE Breakdown)
8. Financial Warning Indicators
9. Comprehensive Evaluation and Suggestions

items.title: Annual Budget Planning
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in planning an annual budget:

Company/Dept: [Input name]
Budget Year: [Input year]
Revenue Target: [Input target]
Strategic Focus: [Input key items]

Budget planning should include:
1. Principles and Assumptions
2. Revenue Budget
   - By product line/customer/region
   - Growth assumptions
3. Cost Budget
   - Direct costs
   - Indirect costs
   - Fixed vs. Variable costs
4. Expense Budget
   - Personnel
   - Marketing
   - R&D
   - Admin
5. CAPEX Budget
6. Cash Flow Budget
7. Allocation Suggestions
8. Monthly/Quarterly Decomposition
9. Control Mechanisms
10. Variance Analysis Process
11. Adjustment Mechanisms
12. Achievement Incentives

items.title: Cost Control Solution

items.content:

Pain Points: [Input cost issues]
Saving Goal: [Input amount or %]

2. Cost Driver Analysis

   - Resource utilization

5. Feasibility Analysis
6. Priority Ranking
7. Action Plans
8. Implementation Timeline
9. Risk Assessment
10. Benefit Tracking

items.title: Cash Flow Management Plan
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in planning a cash flow management plan:

Company Type: [Startup/Growth/Mature, etc.]
Main Issues: [Cash shortage/Idle funds/Turnover, etc.]
Industry: [Input industry]

The plan should include:
1. Current Situation Analysis
   - Operating cycle analysis
   - Cash conversion cycle
2. Cash Flow Forecast (Next 3-12 months)
3. Collection Management Optimization
   - A/R management
   - Collection policy review
   - Credit management
4. Payment Management Optimization
   - A/P management
   - Payment term negotiation
5. Inventory Optimization
6. Cash Level Management
   - Minimum cash requirements
   - Warning mechanisms
7. Short-term Financing
8. Idle Fund Utilization
9. Financing Planning (if needed)
10. Cash Flow Dashboard
11. Risk Scenario Planning

items.title: Financial Presentation Preparation
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in preparing a financial presentation:

Audience: [Board/Investors/Management/Employees]
Purpose: [Quarterly review/Annual summary/Fundraising/Project report]
Time Limit: [Input duration]

Suggested Framework:
1. Executive Summary
   - Key numbers and highlights
   - Main findings
2. Financial Performance Review
   - Revenue and Profit
   - Comparison with target/last year
3. Key Financial Ratios
   - Visual charts
   - Trend explanations
4. Cost and Expense Analysis
5. Cash Flow and Health Status
6. Dept/Product Line Performance
7. Risks and Challenges
8. Outlook and Action Plans
9. Q&A Preparation

Please provide:
- Suggested chart types
- Data visualization tips
- Storytelling framework
- Potential questions and responses

items.title: Meeting Minutes Organization
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in organizing meeting minutes:

Meeting Name: [Input theme]
Date & Time: [Input]
Attendees: [Input participants]
Content: [Input discussion points or transcript]

Minutes Format:
1. Basic Info (Name, Date, Time, Location, Chair, Recorder, Attendees/Absentees)
2. Meeting Purpose
3. Discussion Summary (Bullet points)
4. Decisions Made
5. Action Items (Task, Owner, Deadline)
6. Next Meeting Time
7. Attachment List (if any)

Please ensure:
- Clear highlights
- Explicit actions
- Assigned responsibilities
- Specific deadlines

items.title: Company Regulation Drafting
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in drafting company regulations:

Type: [Work rules/Travel policy/Leave policy, etc.]
Target: [All employees/Specific depts, etc.]
Purpose: [Input purpose]
Basis: [Labor laws/Company policy, etc.]

Structure should include:
1. Name and Legal Basis
2. Purpose and Scope
3. Definitions
4. Responsible Units
5. Detailed Provisions (Clear clauses, numbering, full coverage of scenarios)
6. Procedures (if needed)
7. Form Templates (if needed)
8. Violations and Penalties
9. Exceptions
10. Effective Date
11. Revision History

Please ensure:
- Compliance with labor laws
- Unambiguous wording
- High executability
- Fairness and rationality

items.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD)
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in writing a Product Requirements Document (PRD):

Product Name: [Input product/feature]
Target Users: [Input user type]
Problem Statement: [Input problem to solve]

The PRD should include:
1. Doc Info (Version, Date, Owner)
2. Background and Goals (Why, Business goals, Success metrics)
3. User Research (Target users, Pain points, Scenarios)
4. Requirements (Functional, Non-functional, Priority: Must/Should/Nice to have)
5. User Stories and Flows
6. UI/UX Design Points
7. Tech Constraints and Dependencies
8. Launch Plan and Milestones
9. Risks and Assumptions
10. Future Planning
11. Appendix (Refs, Competitor analysis)

items.title: User Story Writing
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in writing User Stories:

Feature: [Input feature]
Role: [Input role]
Scenario: [Input scenario]

Format:
As a [role]
I want to [action/feature]
So that [purpose/value]

Each User Story should include:
1. Description (Format above)
2. Acceptance Criteria (Given/When/Then)
3. Priority (P0/P1/P2)
4. Story Points Estimation
5. Related Doc/Design Links
6. Notes

Please provide:
- 5-10 related User Stories
- Ensure INVEST principles

items.content:

Our Product: [Input product]
Competitors: [Input 2-3 main competitors]
Focus: [Features/Experience/Business model, etc.]

items.title: Data Dashboard Planning
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in planning a product data dashboard:

Type: [Web/App/SaaS, etc.]
Main Goal: [Growth/Retention/Revenue, etc.]
Users: [PM/Management/Ops, etc.]

Design should include:
1. Key Metrics Setting
   **North Star Metric**
   - Growth (DAU/MAU/New users)
   - Engagement (Frequency/Duration)
   - Retention (Day 1/7/30)
   - Revenue (ARPU/LTV/CAC)
   - Conversion (Funnel stages)
2. Dashboard Hierarchy (Overview, Detailed feature analysis, Behavior analysis)
3. Visualization Suggestions (Chart types, Layout)
4. Alert Mechanisms
5. Update Frequency
6. Segmentation (Platform/Region/User type)
7. Data Source and Logic
8. Implementation Tool Suggestions

items.title: Code Review Checklist
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in establishing a code review checklist:

Language: [Input language]
Type: [Web/Mobile/Backend, etc.]
Team Size: [Input count]

Checklist should include:
1. Functionality (Specs compliance, Edge cases, Error handling)
2. Quality (Naming, DRY principle, Single responsibility, Comments)
3. Performance (Time/Space complexity, DB query optimization, Caching)
4. Security (Input validation, SQLi/XSS protection, Sensitive data)
5. Maintainability (Clear structure, Testability, Docs)
6. Test Coverage (Unit, Integration)
7. Version Control (Commit messages, Branching strategy)

items.title: Technical Documentation Writing
items.author: @happycoder
items.content:
Please assist in writing technical documentation:

Type: [API Doc/Architecture/Deployment guide, etc.]
Reader: [Devs/Ops/Newcomers, etc.]
Tech Stack: [Input tech]

Doc should include:
1. Overview (Purpose, Target, Prerequisites)
2. Functionality Overview
3. Architecture Design (System diagram, Data flow, Tech selection)
4. Detailed Specs (RESTful endpoints, Request/Response, Error codes, Data models)
5. Code Examples (Scenarios, Best practices)
6. Environment Setup (Dev env, Deployment)
7. Testing Guide
8. Troubleshooting
9. Change Log
10. Related Resources

5. Risk Assessment (Tech/Business risk, Mitigation)
6. Implementation Plan (Phases, Timeline, Resources)
7. Testing Strategy
8. Rollback Plan
9. Cost-Benefit Analysis
10. Success Metrics
